pages.title: Netherite Axe
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Axe is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:weapons/diamond_axe)Diamond Axe$(/l).$(br)$(li)It inflicts more damage, has more durability and cut down trees more quickly than the last one.

pages.name: Netherite Axe
pages.text: This item can't be burned in the fire or lava.
